articles.title: Indian stock market: How big is the Covid-19 risk for equities? Experts answer | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The Covid-19 pandemic caused widespread uncertainty and panic in financial markets worldwide in 2020. Stock markets across the globe suffered strong losses as concerns over the pandemic and its potential economic impact grew.
articles.content: Covid-19 fear is back to haunt the markets. Equity benchmarks Nifty 50 and Sensex cracked over a per cent in the previous session on Wednesday, December 20.  The early trade on Thursday, December 21,… [+4878 chars]
